languages.text: "Загадка. Проект держался в секрете ото всех, в том числе и от оружейников. Мы ковали фрагменты... Это было средство обуздания энергии грандиозной мощи, и в основе его лежали не благодатные дары Омниссии. Запретные знания, их мы постигали".

"An enigma. The project was kept secret from everyone, including the smiths. We forged fragments of it... It was a tool for controlling energies of staggering power, and it was not the Omnissiah's blessed gifts that served as its foundation. It was forbidden knowledge, knowledge that we comprehended."
languages.original_text: "Загадка. Проект держался в секрете ото всех, в том числе и от оружейников. Мы ковали фрагменты... Это было средство обуздания энергии грандиозной мощи, и в основе его лежали не благодатные дары Омниссии. Запретные знания, их мы постигали".

languages.text: “一切如谜，没人清楚这个项目的真相，就连那些铁匠都不例外。我们铸造了圣枷的碎片……这件工具可以驾驭极其强大的力量。它的理论基础并非欧姆尼塞亚的恩赐，而是遭到禁止的知识，那些我们曾一度理解的知识。”
languages.original_text: "An enigma. The project was kept secret from everyone, including the smiths. We forged fragments of it... It was a tool for controlling energies of staggering power, and it was not the Omnissiah's blessed gifts that served as its foundation. It was forbidden knowledge, knowledge that we comprehended."

traits.locale_text: “一切如谜，没人清楚这个项目的真相，就连那些铁匠都不例外。我们铸造了圣枷的碎片……这件工具可以驾驭极其强大的力量。它的理论基础并非欧姆尼塞亚的恩赐，而是遭到禁止的知识，那些我们曾一度理解的知识。”
traits.speaker: DoorLockerTechpriest1

languages.text: « C'est une énigme. Le projet est resté secret pour tout le monde, même les artisans. Nous avons forgé ses fragments... Il s'agissait d'un outil permettant de contrôler des énergies d'une puissance extraordinaire, mais il n'avait pas pour fondation les dons sacrés de l'Omnimessie. Il se basait sur un savoir interdit, mais que nous comprenions. »
languages.original_text: "An enigma. The project was kept secret from everyone, including the smiths. We forged fragments of it... It was a tool for controlling energies of staggering power, and it was not the Omnissiah's blessed gifts that served as its foundation. It was forbidden knowledge, knowledge that we comprehended."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une énigme. Le projet est resté secret pour tout le monde, même les artisans. Nous avons forgé ses fragments... Il s'agissait d'un outil permettant de contrôler des énergies d'une puissance extraordinaire, mais il n'avait pas pour fondation les dons sacrés de l'Omnimessie. Il se basait sur un savoir interdit, mais que nous comprenions. »
traits.speaker: DoorLockerTechpriest1

languages.text: 「わからないわ。このプロジェクトは鍛冶職人を含め、すべての人たちに秘密にされていた。私たちはその断片を鍛造しただけ…驚異的な力を持つエネルギーを制御するための道具であり、その基礎となったのは万機神の祝福された贈り物ではなかった。それは禁じられた、知り得る知識だった」
languages.original_text: "An enigma. The project was kept secret from everyone, including the smiths. We forged fragments of it... It was a tool for controlling energies of staggering power, and it was not the Omnissiah's blessed gifts that served as its foundation. It was forbidden knowledge, knowledge that we comprehended."

traits.locale_text: 「わからないわ。このプロジェクトは鍛冶職人を含め、すべての人たちに秘密にされていた。私たちはその断片を鍛造しただけ…驚異的な力を持つエネルギーを制御するための道具であり、その基礎となったのは万機神の祝福された贈り物ではなかった。それは禁じられた、知り得る知識だった」
traits.speaker: DoorLockerTechpriest1

languages.text: «Un enigma. Nadie conocía el proyecto; ni siquiera los herreros. Lo forjábamos por partes... Era una herramienta para controlar energías de gran envergadura; no se cimentaba sobre los dones sagrados del Omnissiah. Era conocimiento prohibido, uno que solo nosotros comprendíamos».
languages.original_text: "An enigma. The project was kept secret from everyone, including the smiths. We forged fragments of it... It was a tool for controlling energies of staggering power, and it was not the Omnissiah's blessed gifts that served as its foundation. It was forbidden knowledge, knowledge that we comprehended."

traits.locale_text: «Un enigma. Nadie conocía el proyecto; ni siquiera los herreros. Lo forjábamos por partes... Era una herramienta para controlar energías de gran envergadura; no se cimentaba sobre los dones sagrados del Omnissiah. Era conocimiento prohibido, uno que solo nosotros comprendíamos».
traits.speaker: DoorLockerTechpriest1

languages.text: "Ein Enigma. Das Projekt wurde vor allen geheim gehalten, selbst vor den Schmieden. Wir haben Fragmente davon geschmiedet ... Es war ein Werkzeug, um Energien von atemberaubender Macht zu kontrollieren, und es waren nicht die gesegneten Gaben des Omnissiah, die als seine Basis dienten. Es war verbotenes Wissen, Wissen, dass wir begriffen."
languages.original_text: "An enigma. The project was kept secret from everyone, including the smiths. We forged fragments of it... It was a tool for controlling energies of staggering power, and it was not the Omnissiah's blessed gifts that served as its foundation. It was forbidden knowledge, knowledge that we comprehended."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Enigma. Das Projekt wurde vor allen geheim gehalten, selbst vor den Schmieden. Wir haben Fragmente davon geschmiedet ... Es war ein Werkzeug, um Energien von atemberaubender Macht zu kontrollieren, und es waren nicht die gesegneten Gaben des Omnissiah, die als seine Basis dienten. Es war verbotenes Wissen, Wissen, dass wir begriffen."
traits.speaker: DoorLockerTechpriest1

languages.text: "Bir gizem. Proje, ustalar dâhil herkesten gizleniyordu. Parçalarını dövdük... Afallatan bir gücü kontrol edebilecek bir araçtı ve temelini, Hermesih'in kutsanmış hediyeleri oluşturmuyordu... Hayır. Temelini yasaklanmış irfan oluşturuyordu, biz bu bilgileri idrak etmiştik."
languages.original_text: "An enigma. The project was kept secret from everyone, including the smiths. We forged fragments of it... It was a tool for controlling energies of staggering power, and it was not the Omnissiah's blessed gifts that served as its foundation. It was forbidden knowledge, knowledge that we comprehended."
